column1: 1) The substances which are counted (for the purpose of these figures) as New Psychoactive Substances are described in Annex E.
2) This is within the Drug Strategy 'baseline' definition, as implemented by National Records of Scotland

* apart, perhaps, from alcohol. For example, a death for which mephedrone and alcohol were the only substances that were implicated in the death would be counted under 'NPS the only substance(s) implicated in the death'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ** apart, perhaps, from alcohol.
